SOURCE CODE ESCROW

Future-proof your data

Ensure unparalleled safety, integrity, and availability of the data you need to successfully recover and operate critical software applications.

Safe backups across all environments

Whether you store your data in physical, virtual, or cloud environments, we have a solution for you. Choose from one of our three options, or request a custom solution.

Don’t see a solution that meets your needs?

Let us know.

Data SnapShot

Your data is always changing, and in case of unforeseen corruption or loss, all of it could become unusable or irreversibly lost. With Codekeeper’s SnapShot Upload, you can ensure your data is safe, quickly accessible, and always available. Take a data ‘snapshot’ at a moment in time and upload it to our secure data centers at predefined intervals.

GET STARTED

Database Mirroring

Database mirroring maintains two copies of a single database that reside on different instances of the (SQL) Server Database Engine. We connect to your database instances and create mirrors that sync at set intervals, helping you ensure you’re able to quickly bring the standby copy of your database online in case of an emergency, without any data loss.

GET STARTED

Repository Connection

If you store your data with AWS S3, Bitbucket, Azure Blob, GitLab, SourceForge, or a lesser-known host, automate data escrow deposits directly from your preferred repository to Codekeeper’s world-class data centers. Your data escrow vault seamlessly and securely connects to your object storage buckets and takes care-free deposits at desired intervals.

GET STARTED

Secure your source code — and peace of mind

Add an additional layer of protection by ensuring you have everything you need for a successful recovery. Validate the completeness and usability of each escrow deposit, and once you execute your recovery plans, test whether your application data was properly restored.

Trusted by Fortune 500 and small companies alike

Take advantage of cost-effective, scalable, enterprise-grade features.

Platform

We help global companies of all sizes protect and manage their most critical assets with minimal effort thanks to a quick set-up process, intuitive UI, and cutting-edge security features.

Frameworks

Codekeeper supports all development frameworks, including Java, .NET, Python, and Node.js, helping improve your team’s agility with seamless automations.

Availability

Securely store your data and maintain its safety and integrity at our state-of-the-art data centers while ensuring around-the-clock availability, whenever you need it.

Scalability

Scale your escrow repositories up and down to meet fluctuating demands. Protect your data for only $79/month, with a start-up fee of $249, including unlimited deposits and more.

Flexibility

Organize your data and configure escrow repositories in ways that meet your specific business, organizational, contractual, and compliance requirements.

Integrations

Whether you use an in-memory database, an online repository, or different physical data centers, we integrate with popular cloud services and custom solutions alike.

Best-in-class security

We’ve built the strictest security standards into the core of our product, and we conduct comprehensive audits of our applications, systems, and networks to ensure your data is always protected.

ISO27001 DATA SECURITY

Safeguard the security of your code and data in accordance with the strictest global security standards and controls.

END-TO-END ENCRYPTION

Maintain the processing integrity and minimize exposure of sensitive data both at rest and in-transit.

SECURE UPLOAD FOLDER

Automate your deposits with frictionless technology or make seamless manual deposits with our Secure Upload system.
